to.sven.androidrccar.common.framework

Interface IDependencyContainer<TFactory extends IFactory,TListener extends ILogicListener>

  • Type Parameters:
    TFactory - The interface of the concrete IFactory
    TListener - The interface of the concrete ILogicListener.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDependencyContainer

    public interface IDependencyContainer<TFactory extends IFactory,TListener extends ILogicListener>
    The IDependencyContainer contains all dependences for the AbstractLogic and it's dependences.
    Author:
    sven
